00034 template < int nOrder >
00035 class GreensFunction {
00036   float m_dx;
00037  public:
00038   GreensFunction( float dx ) : m_dx( dx ) { }
00039   inline float apply( int k ) {
00040     std::cerr << " - Error: Calling non-specialized (i.e. non-implemented ) version of GreensFunction::apply!" << std::endl;
00041     return 1.0f;
00042   }
00043 };
00044 
00045 template <>
00046 inline float GreensFunction<3>::apply( int k ) {
00047   float ss = sin( 0.5 * m_dx * ( float ) k );
00048   return 4.0*ss*ss;
00049 }
00050 
00051 template <>
00052 inline float GreensFunction<5>::apply( int k ) {
00053   const static float a0 = 0.6666666666666666667;
00054   float ss = sin( 0.5 * m_dx * ( float ) k );
00055   return -a0*ss*ss*( cos( m_dx * ( float ) k ) - 7.0 );
00056 }
00057 
00058 template <>
00059 inline float GreensFunction<7>::apply( int k ) {
00060   const static float a0 = -0.04444444444444444444;
00061   float ss = sin( 0.5 * m_dx * k );
00062   return a0*ss*ss*( 23.0 * cos( m_dx * ( float ) k ) - 2.0 * cos( 2.0 * m_dx * ( float ) k ) - 111.0 );
00063 }
00064 
00065 template <>
00066 inline float GreensFunction<9>::apply( int k ) {
00067   const static float a0 = -1.58730159e-3;
00068   float ss = sin( 0.5 * m_dx * ( float ) k );
00069   return a0*ss*ss*( 779.0 * cos( m_dx * ( float ) k ) - 110.0 * cos( 2.0 * m_dx * ( float ) k )
00070             + 9.0 * cos( 3.0 * m_dx * ( float ) k ) - 3198.0 );
00071 }
00072 
00073 template <>
00074 inline float GreensFunction<11>::apply( int k ) {
00075   const static float a0 = -3.17460317e-4;
00076   float ss = sin( 0.5 * m_dx * ( float ) k );
00077   return a0*ss*ss*( 4343.0 * cos( m_dx * ( float ) k ) - 774.0 * cos( 2.0 * m_dx * ( float ) k )
00078             + 109.0 * cos( 3.0 * m_dx * ( float ) k ) - 8.0 * cos( 4.0 * m_dx * ( float ) k )
00079             - 16270.0 );
00080 }

00082 class array3 {
00083  protected:
00084   float *m_data;
00085   int m_nx, m_ny, m_nz;
00086   bool bRealContainer;
00087  public:
00088 
00089   array3( void )
00090     : m_data( NULL ), m_nx( 0 ), m_ny( 0 ), m_nz( 0 ), bRealContainer( false ) {}
00091 
00092   array3( float *dataptr, int nx, int ny, int nz )
00093     : m_data( dataptr ), m_nx( nx ), m_ny( ny ), m_nz( nz ), bRealContainer( false ) {}
00094 
00095   array3( int nx, int ny, int nz )
00096     : m_data( new float[ nx*ny*nz ] ), m_nx( nx ), m_ny( ny ), m_nz( nz ), bRealContainer( true ) {
00097     for ( long long i = 0; i < nx*ny*nz; ++i )
00098       m_data[ i ] = 0.0f;
00099   }
00100 
00101   ~array3() {
00102     if ( bRealContainer )
00103       delete[] m_data;
00104   }
00105 
00106   float& operator() ( int ix, int iy, int iz ) {
00107     return m_data[ ( ix * m_ny + iy ) * m_nz + iz ];
00108   }
00109 
00110   float operator() ( int ix, int iy, int iz ) const {
00111     return m_data[ ( ix * m_ny + iy ) * m_nz + iz ];
00112   }
00113 
00114   int get_size( void ) {
00115     return std::max( std::max( m_nx, m_ny ), m_nz );
00116   }
00117 
00118   void recreate( int nx, int ny, int nz ) {
00119     if ( bRealContainer )
00120       delete[] m_data;
00121     else
00122       bRealContainer = true;
00123 
00124     m_nx = nx;
00125     m_ny = ny;
00126     m_nz = nz;
00127     m_data = new float[ m_nx * m_ny * m_nz ];
00128 
00129     for ( long long i = 0; i < nx*ny*nz; ++i )
00130       m_data[ i ] = 0.0f;
00131   }
00132 };

00134 class ScalarField {
00135 
00136  protected:
00137   //  float *m_data;
00138   array3 m_data;
00139   //  std::vector<ScalarField> m_dy;

00146 
00147   void diff_primitive( ScalarField*, bool bStagger = false );
00148  public:
00149 
00150   ScalarField( void )
00151     : m_dx( 0.0f ), m_nx( 0 ), m_ny( 0 ), m_nz( 0 ), m_nstencil( 0 ) { }
00152 
00153   ScalarField( unsigned nx, unsigned ny, unsigned nz, float dx, int nstencil )
00154     : m_data( nx, ny, nz ),   // m_dy( local_nx, ny, nz ),
00155     m_dx( dx ), m_nx( nx ), m_ny( ny ), m_nz( nz ), m_nstencil( nstencil ) {
00156     m_nsten2 = ( m_nstencil - 1 ) / 2;
00157   }
00158 
00159   void recreate( unsigned nx, unsigned ny, unsigned nz, float dx, int nstencil ) {
00160     m_nx = nx;
00161     m_ny = ny;
00162     m_nz = nz;
00163     m_nstencil = nstencil;
00164     m_dx = dx;
00165     m_nsten2 = ( nstencil - 1 ) / 2;
00166     m_data.recreate( m_nx, m_ny, m_nz );
00167   }

00201   void lookup( float *Coord, unsigned nCoord, std::vector< float >& values ) {
00202     values.clear();
00203     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nCoord; ++i ) {
00204       values.push_back( ( *this ) ( Coord[ 3 * i ], Coord[ 3 * i + 1 ], Coord[ 3 * i + 2 ] ) );
00205     }
00206   }
00207 
00208   void lookup( float *Coord, unsigned nCoord, float ll, unsigned N, std::vector< float >& values ) {
00209     values.clear();
00210     float factor = 1.0; //(float)N/ll;
00211     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nCoord; ++i ) {
00212       values.push_back( ( *this ) ( Coord[ 3 * i ] * factor, Coord[ 3 * i + 1 ] * factor, Coord[ 3 * i + 2 ] * factor ) );
00213     }
00214   }

00216   template < typename T >
00217     T get_NGP( T *coord ) {
00218     int
00219       ix = ( int ) coord[ 0 ],
00220       iy = ( int ) coord[ 1 ],
00221       iz = ( int ) coord[ 2 ];
00222 
00223     return ( *this ) ( ix, iy, iz );
00224   }
00225 
00226   float get_CIC( float coordx, float coordy, float coordz ) {
00227 
00228     int
00229       ix = ( int ) coordx,
00230       iy = ( int ) coordy,
00231       iz = ( int ) coordz,
00232       ix1 = ( ix + 1 ) % m_nx,
00233       iy1 = ( iy + 1 ) % m_ny,
00234       iz1 = ( iz + 1 ) % m_nz;
00235 
00236 
00237     float
00238       dx = ( float ) ( coordx - ( float ) ix ),
00239       dy = ( float ) ( coordy - ( float ) iy ),
00240       dz = ( float ) ( coordz - ( float ) iz ),
00241       tx = 1.0 - dx,
00242       ty = 1.0 - dy,
00243       tz = 1.0 - dz;
00244 
00245     float
00246       f_xyz = ( *this ) ( ix, iy, iz ) * tx * ty * tz,
00247       f_Xyz = ( *this ) ( ix1, iy, iz ) * dx * ty * tz,
00248       f_xYz = ( *this ) ( ix, iy1, iz ) * tx * dy * tz,
00249       f_xyZ = ( *this ) ( ix, iy, iz1 ) * tx * ty * dz,
00250       f_XYz = ( *this ) ( ix1, iy1, iz ) * dx * dy * tz,
00251       f_XyZ = ( *this ) ( ix1, iy, iz1 ) * dx * ty * dz,
00252       f_xYZ = ( *this ) ( ix, iy1, iz1 ) * tx * dy * dz,
00253       f_XYZ = ( *this ) ( ix1, iy1, iz1 ) * dx * dy * dz;
00254 
00255     return f_xyz + f_Xyz + f_xYz + f_xyZ + f_XYz + f_XyZ + f_xYZ + f_XYZ;
00256   }

00258   void ChooseStencil( void );
00259   void diff2atCIC( float *Coord, unsigned nPoints, std::vector< Matrix33 > &t_ij );
00260 
00261   inline float diff1( int ix, int iy, int iz, int i ) {
00262     int iright[ 3 ];
00263     for ( int k = 0; k < 3; ++k )
00264       iright[ k ] = 0;
00265     iright[ i ] = + 1;
00266 
00267     float d1i = 0.0;
00268 
00269     for ( int ii = -m_nsten2; ii <= m_nsten2; ++ii ) {
00270       int iix = ( ix + ii * iright[ 0 ] + m_nx ) % m_nx;
00271       int iiy = ( iy + ii * iright[ 1 ] + m_ny ) % m_ny;
00272       int iiz = ( iz + ii * iright[ 2 ] + m_nz ) % m_nz;
00273       d1i += m_pStencil1[ ii + m_nsten2 ] * ( *this ) ( iix, iiy, iiz );
00274     }
00275 
00276     return d1i;
00277   }
00278 
00279   inline float diff2( int ix, int iy, int iz, int i, int j ) {
00280     // trace component of the Hessian?
00281     if ( i == j ) {
00282 
00283       int iright[ 3 ];
00284 
00285       for ( int k = 0; k < 3; ++k )
00286     iright[ k ] = 0;
00287       iright[ i ] = + 1;
00288 
00289       float d2ii = 0.0;
00290 
00291       for ( int ii = -m_nsten2; ii <= m_nsten2; ++ii ) {
00292     int iix = ( ix + ii * iright[ 0 ] + m_nx ) % m_nx;
00293     int iiy = ( iy + ii * iright[ 1 ] + m_ny ) % m_ny;
00294     int iiz = ( iz + ii * iright[ 2 ] + m_nz ) % m_nz;
00295     d2ii += m_pStencil2[ ii + m_nsten2 ] * ( *this ) ( iix, iiy, iiz );
00296       }
00297       return d2ii;
00298     }
00299 
00300     // off-trace component of the Hessian
00301     int jright[ 3 ];
00302 
00303     for ( int k = 0; k < 3; ++k )
00304       jright[ k ] = 0;
00305     jright[ j ] = + 1;
00306 
00307     float d1j = 0;
00308 
00309     for ( int ii = -m_nsten2; ii <= m_nsten2; ++ii ) {
00310       int iix = ( ix + ii * jright[ 0 ] + m_nx ) % m_nx;
00311       int iiy = ( iy + ii * jright[ 1 ] + m_ny ) % m_ny;
00312       int iiz = ( iz + ii * jright[ 2 ] + m_nz ) % m_nz;
00313       d1j += m_pStencil1[ ii + m_nsten2 ] * this->diff1( iix, iiy, iiz, i );
00314     }
00315 
00316     return d1j;
00317   }
00318 };
